error_patterns.title: Type annotations missing in HTML parser implementation
error_patterns.description: BeautifulSoup and regex operations lacked proper type hints causing basedpyright warnings
error_patterns.root_cause: Mixed Selenium and BeautifulSoup code without proper type annotations for set[str]
error_patterns.solution: Added explicit type hints: found_skills: set[str] = set(), proper imports cleanup
error_patterns.pattern: Always use specific type hints for collections (set[str] not set[Unknown])

error_patterns.title: CSV Export - Visualization Data Mismatch
error_patterns.description: CSV export data didn't match visualization data due to different data sources
error_patterns.root_cause: Visualizations used normalized_jobs while CSV used raw db_jobs_dicts
error_patterns.solution: Updated both to use same normalized_jobs data pipeline
error_patterns.pattern: Always use same data source for visualization and export

error_patterns.title: CSV Export - Skills Data Mismatch
error_patterns.description: CSV export showing 0 skills count due to schema mismatch
error_patterns.root_cause: Database stores skills as TEXT, export expected skills_list JSON array
error_patterns.solution: Updated export to parse TEXT column skills properly
error_patterns.pattern: Match data processing to actual database schema format

error_patterns.title: Naukri Selector Updates Required
error_patterns.description: Old CSS selectors 'srp-jobtuple-wrapper' no longer exist on Naukri website
error_patterns.root_cause: Website structure changes broke existing selectors
error_patterns.solution: Updated to modern selectors: article.jobTuple, .cust-job-tuple, article[data-job-id]
error_patterns.pattern: Use multiple fallback selectors for website scraping resilience

error_patterns.title: CSV export data mismatch with displayed results
error_patterns.description: Exported CSV contains different skill counts than UI display
error_patterns.root_cause: Skill normalization inconsistency between display and export
error_patterns.solution: Unified skill processing pipeline for both display and export

resolution_strategies.name: Data Pipeline Consistency
resolution_strategies.description: Ensure all data export and visualization use same processing pipeline

resolution_strategies.name: Multi-Selector Fallback
resolution_strategies.description: Use array of CSS selectors with fallback logic for web scraping

resolution_strategies.name: Schema-Aware Processing
resolution_strategies.description: Match data processing logic to actual database schema format

prevention_measures.measure: EMD compliance validation - all files â‰¤80 lines

primary_patterns: Use consistent data sources across features
Implement fallback mechanisms for external dependencies
Validate schema alignment before data processing
